alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 24 at 11:17AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Santa Barbara County through 1145 AM PST... At 1115 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Vandenberg Air Force Base, or 13 miles northwest of Lompoc, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. A brief, weak tornado is possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vandenberg Air Force Base. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast
